page.title: 12OUR SCHOOL DAY by CLASS 7
page.content: We go to school at Bengeworth C.E. First School. We start school at nine o'clock and finish at three o'clock. When we have put our coats on our pegs, we go into our classrooms. The classroom are all different sizes. When we have come into the classroom our teacher tskes the register, which is a list of names and when we call out our number our teacher ticks us off in the book. Then we start lessons. In our room we look at a roller blackboard and the writing on it is in white chalk. In Maths we are doing multiplying, decimal fractions and dividing. In English we write stories, poems and work from different books. Every week we learn twenty spellings. Our desks are wooden and in them we keep our pens, pencils and books.
